DisplayName.Value: Road Visual Tweaks (formerly Road Wear Adjuster)

ShortDescription.Value: Adjust the texture, brightness, opacity, smoothness of the road wear

Publish.LongDescription:
# Road Visual Tweaks Adjust the appearance of road wear, bus and bicycle lanes. Each type can be individually toggled on or off.
[Note]: You can configure the base texture to use the original ones, or my custom reflavoured ones. Only the reflavoured road wear texture has been implemented, the reflavoured textures can be found in C:\Users\%USERNAME%\AppData\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\.cache\Mods\mods_subscribed\96718_6\textures, (this number 96718_6 may change) but note that if you edit it, it will probably be gone if the mod/game gets updated.
[Note]: This mod is a purely cosmetic mod, it does not affect gameplay. As such, it should be safe to your saves.
[Note]: The game has been updated so dark road wear is now the default without the mod. Still, if you would like change the road wear, perhaps to something lighter, you can use this mod.

ChangeLog.Value: Compatibility update, more performant when changing settings
